attributes.action: to recognise veterans with war pensions or Armed Forces Compensation Scheme rights under the disability discrimination act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: can those who have been disabled due to service in out armed forces and in receipt of a war disablement pension or the Armed Forces Compensation Scheme be given protection under the disability discrimination act. it is often hard to prove qualification under the DDA as amny people do not understand these schemes.
